long_description: The REI Boxers are an excellent first layer for aerobic activities, and they also offer excellent comfort during regular wear. Soft fabric blend of nylon and spandex breathes well, moves moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Excellent dry time makes the REI boxers great for travel. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Brushed elastic waistband ensures a comfortable fit outing after outing. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Functional fly.
short_description: The REI Boxers are an excellent first layer for aerobic activities, and they also offer excellent comfort during regular wear.
